snippet: Saying that “the world can see that we are united with our allies,” President Obama talked about efforts to lessen tensions in Ukraine but also to sanction that country’s pro-Russia leaders.
abstract: Saying that “the world can see that we are united with our allies,” President Obama talked about efforts to lessen tensions in Ukraine but also to sanction that country’s pro-Russia leaders.

headline.main: President Obama and Aide Speak on Ukraine
